sentences.en: A transitive phrasal verb is followed by an object.
sentences.cn: 及物片语动词需要有直接受词跟随著.

sentences.en: And generate Rs reflexive closure, symmetric closure and transitive closure.
sentences.cn: 并且生成R的自反闭包 、 对称闭包和传递闭包.

sentences.en: For example, transitive verbs need an object , intransitive verbs don't.
sentences.cn: 例如, 及物动词需要受词;不及物动词则不需要.

sentences.en: If it is a transitive verb, what is its object?
sentences.cn: 如果是及物动词, 它的宾语是 什么 ?

sentences.en: In this dictionary the mark 〔 T 〕 shows a transitive verb.
sentences.cn: 本词典中使用[T]符号表示及物动词.

sentences.en: Is this a transitive or an intransitive verb?
sentences.cn: 这是及物动词还是不及动词?

sentences.en: Most transitive verbs can take a reflexive pronoun asobject.
sentences.cn: 大部分及物动词可跟反身代词作宾语.

sentences.en: Most transitive verbs can take a reflexive pronoun.
sentences.cn: 大部分及物动词可接反身代词作宾语.

sentences.en: Most transitive verbs govern the accusative case in German.
sentences.cn: 在德语中,许多及物动词左右着宾格.

sentences.en: Next, we will say something about transitive verb and intransitive verb.
sentences.cn: 下面, 我们讲讲及物动词和不及物动词.

sentences.en: Relations among the average - shadowing property, totally transitive, topologically weakly mixing and chaos were discussed.
sentences.cn: 讨论平均跟踪性与完全传递 、 拓扑弱混合及混沌的关系.

sentences.en: The verbs were subdivided into transitive and intransitive categories.
sentences.cn: 动词被再分为及物动词和不及物动词.

sentences.en: This film shows transitive verbs their everyday life.
sentences.cn: 这部电影显示(出)他们的日常生活.

sentences.en: Verbs that take object are called transitive verbs.
sentences.cn: 带宾语的动词称为及物动词.

words.tran_cn: 过渡；转变；[分子生物] 转换；变调
传递性；动词的及物性；转移性

phrases.tran_cn: 及物动词；单宾动词；外动词

trans.tran_cn: （指动词）及物的，过渡的，转变的，<数><逻>可递的
trans.tran_en: a transitive verb must have an object, for example the verb ‘break’ in the sentence ‘I broke the cup’. Transitive verbs are marked [T] in this dictionary.
